src_original: atha bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate sma /

śraddadhāsi tvam ānanda /  pattīyasi /  yad ahaṃ tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaiḍūryaprabharājasya tathāgatasya guṇān varṇayāmi /  atha te kāṅkṣā vā vimatir vā vicikitsā vâtra gambhīre buddhagocare //
tgt_original: 如我稱揚彼佛世尊藥師瑠璃光如來所有功德，此是諸佛甚深行處難可解了。 汝為信不？
阿難白言： 大德世尊！

src_original: na me bhadanta bhagavan kāṅkṣā vā vimatir vā vicikitsā vā tathāgatabhāṣiteṣu sūtrânteṣu /
tgt_original: 我於如來所說契經不生疑惑。
一切如來身語意業無不清淨。

src_original: imau bhagavan candrasūryāv evaṃ maharddhikāv evaṃ mahânubhāvau pṛthivyāṃ patetāṃ /  sumeruḥ parvatarājā sthānāc calet /  na tu buddhānāṃ vacanam anyathā bhavet //
tgt_original: 世尊！ 此日月輪可令墮落、妙高山王可使傾動，諸佛所言無有異也。

src_original: kiṃtu bhadanta bhagavan santi satvāḥ śraddhêndriyavikalā ye buddhagocaraṃ śrutvā na śraddadhati /  teṣām evaṃ bhavati /
tgt_original: 世尊！ 有諸眾生信根不具，聞說諸佛甚深行處，作是思惟：

src_original: katham idaṃ nāmadheyaṃ smaraṇamātreṇa tasya tathāgatasyâittakā guṇânuśaṃsā bhavati /
tgt_original: 云何但念藥師瑠璃光如來一佛名號便獲爾所功德勝利？
